text: Mississauga North was an electoral riding in Ontario, Canada, in the municipal areas of Mississauga and Brampton from 1975 to 1999. Prior to 1975 it was contained within the ridings of Peel North and Peel. After 1999 it was re- distributed to two new ridings: Brampton West—Mississauga and Bramalea—Gore—Malton—Springdale. ==Members of Provincial Parliament== ==References== Category:Politics of Mississauga Category:Defunct Ontario provincial electoral districts
title: Mississauga North (provincial electoral district)
